module.name: Asterisk SIP Settings
module.description: Use to configure Various Asterisk SIP Settings in the General section of sip.conf. Also includes an auto-configuration tool to determine NAT settings. The module assumes Asterisk version 1.4 or higher. Some settings may not exist in Asterisk 1.2 and will be ignored by Asterisk.
module.changelog: *2.8.0.1* #4681 *2.8.0.0* published 2.8 version *2.7.0.1* localizations *2.7.0.0* #3976 allows codec priorities *2.6.0.7* #3866 *2.6.0.6* #3722, localizations *2.6.0.5* #3831, #3722 *2.6.0.4* spelling errors *2.6.0.3* #3814 *2.6.0.2* #3808, #3809, #3810 *2.6.0.1* corrected publisher/lic *2.6.0.0* localizations, misc *2.6.0beta1.2* install script 'if not exists' missing *2.6.0beta1.1* misc bugs, typos *2.6.0beta1.0* lots of tweaks, fixed install.php error *2.6.0alpha1.1* Added db *2.6.0alpha1.0* Incomplete screen mockup
